# linkedDevices

**Instance Property**

An array of capture devices that are physically linked to a device.

## Declaration

```swift
var linkedDevices: [AVCaptureDevice] { get }
```

## Discussion

For an external iSight camera, the array contains an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice] instance that represents the external iSight microphone.
title: linkedDevices
